nodes.text: The Golan-II Defense Platform was a class of space station that was manufactured by Golan Arms and used by the Galactic Empire's Imperial Navy. It was much larger and more heavily armed than the Golan I Space Defense Platform, and along with the Golan III defense platform, dozens were in orbit of Coruscant and other important Imperial Core Worlds for defense. Due to the amount of weaponry it had, Golan-II Defense Platforms could repel determined assaults.
